items.title: Nicki Minaj supports contested Trump claim Christians being persecuted in Nigeria
items.description: The US-based Trinidadian rapper addressed the UN in New York alongside Trump administration officials, making claims that lack evidence.

items.title: At least 20 killed in one of Russia's deadliest strikes on western Ukraine
items.description: Among the victims were two children in the attack on the western city of Ternopil.

items.title: Epstein files bill to be sent to Trump after approval from Congress
items.description: Once the US president signs the measure, the justice department will have 30 days to release the materials.

items.title: Zelensky visits Turkey in bid to 'intensify' peace talks
items.description: There were no plans for the Russian side to join the talks, the Kremlin said.

items.title: Family of Indian man lynched over beef rumours vows to keep fighting for justice
items.description: Mohammad Akhlaq was lynched to death in 2015 over rumours that he had eaten beef.
